Message: The user completes the submission of the form

Hey there! It sounds like you're asking about ad rejections. Ads can be rejected for various reasons, such as incorrect conversion tracking setup or typographical errors. You should receive an email from Ad Support with the specific reason for the rejection. If you need more details on what to do next, you can check out this article: [My ad got rejected. What's next?](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next). Let me know if you have any other questions!

"The product associated with your ad violates our Advertising Policy - Review of product and landing page show false reviews/untrustworthy and low trust scores. Please select another product to advertise and resubmit."

It looks like your ad was rejected due to issues with the product and landing page, specifically related to false reviews and low trust scores. To resolve this, you should select a different product that complies with our Advertising Policy and resubmit your ad. I recommend reviewing our Ad Policy document for detailed guidelines on what is acceptable. You can find it here: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out!

It looks like your ad was rejected due to issues with the product's trustworthiness and reviews. To fix this, you should select a different product that complies with NewsBreak's Advertising Policy. Make sure the new product has genuine reviews and a trustworthy landing page. You can review our Ad Policy for more details on what is allowed: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to ask!
